title: Avalon Roulette
description: A life with Leo was all Holly ever wanted and she got it, at a price. Did Leo really think his parents; the King and Queen of Avalon would sit back and let him stay on earth? After all Leo, the Prince of Avalon had future responsibilities and he has been promised to another. The Royal League instructions from the King and Queen are clear, bring their son home and eliminate the problem; Holly. Leo and Holly find themselves on the run, always looking over their shoulder, trying to stay safe from the threat of being torn apart.
author: Lana Davison
